title.narrative: High value opportunity - Development of a modern dairy production in China, the Danish way, Heilongjiang Province

description.narrative:
A big Investment in agricultural farms are taking place in the Heilongjiang province, China to secure a modern standard and to accommodate the increasing need for food in China. Danish technologies are introduced by making a demonstration farm to show case Danish solutions throughout the production chain.
The project will primarily contribute to the economic and social development in two ways: Through a modernization of the dairy producing sector, thus addressing a high-priority social issue from central government¿s perspective, creating development and increasing incomes in the rural areas, in order to maintain food security and social stability. Further, addressing the food safety concerns in China is a key issue in the process of upgrading China¿s agricultural sector, where consumers have little trust in domestic products and where frequent food safety scandals reflect production systems lacking adequate control and traceability systems throughout the entire value chain.
